txt.en:
'You have dealt with the half-orc rabble here in northern Eregion, [placeholder], but their true purpose is only beginning to become clear.

'Recently, our scouts have indicated that a half-orc with some skill in training the worms is attempting to bend the vile beasts to his will. If he succeeds, he could build a terrible army in Eregion.

'Return to the east and look for a small range of mountains south of the road to Rivendell.  Among them is Carchres.  If you find Arzgât there, put an end to his vile ambitions.'
'Arzgât has perished? That is welcome news, [placeholder]. Perhaps the evil he has wrought will soon come to an end.'
'Thank you again, [placeholder]. Your efforts against the half-orcs will not be forgotten.'
'Arzgât was last seen on the northern side of a small range of mountains to the east, just south of the road to Rivendell.'
The egg-stealing half-orcs are being overseen by a particularly vicious creature named Arzgât.\n\nCalelloth has asked you to head out to the northern hillside of Carchres and slay Arzgât.
Bring the note to Calelloth at Gwingris

Arzgât dwells near a small range of mountains, on the hillside of Carchres south of the road to Rivendell, east of Gwingris.\n\nCalelloth has instructed you to go forth and defeat the half-orc Arzgât.
Defeat Arzgât and search his body
